name: Quest for Cloves
description:
Everybody loves yaoi, i mean yowie, the famous australian mythical creature.

We know this to be a fact, so we made a game about yowies, cloves and gravity. 
Why the cloves and gravity you may ask? because those are the other two prompts we got.

Lore? we got lore in spades!
You are a yowie blessed with the power to move objects using gravitational pull, and you've decided to use this power to mess with some clove-people because you have a personal grudge against their leader who bumped into you and didn't apologize seven years ago.
(if matpat is reading this please do a gametheory on this, there's so much hidden plot to find we swear)

Controls: 
Move with WASD
Pick up objects or Peas with E, point at enemies with the mouse, and hold and release E to throw them at enemies.

Unbox / Unzip and open the .exe file to play
